value: with a narcissist or a sociopath is like
a slow-motion fight for your life with a
cougar and imagine if in that
slow-motion fight there were people
around you in a circle watching who
could speak to you in real time and tell
you oh are you sure you want to crush
that Cougars head with that rock that's
gross and also it might be a bit too far
maybe you can just get away from the
Cougar without actually killing it so
Plus Cougars are cute sometimes and
maybe it's just having a bad day and
maybe you're not quite understanding I
don't think he wants to kill you just
throw him your beef jerky and he'll go
away
that's what it's like dealing with
sociopaths and narcissists and having
people around you telling you what they
would do are telling you their
perspective well guess what they're not
the ones rolling around with their
psychological and maybe physical lives
threatened by this vicious determined
predator the real mind f happens because
people don't even need to say that most
of the time the witnesses don't even
need to verbalize it you just know so
you've got two things working against
you you've got your own instincts as a
decent human being where you just don't
want to go there you just don't want to
go to that level and you've got the
witnesses who who maybe they're starting
to get bored of watching you tussle
around with this cougar and they're like
can you not just get over it already can
you not just get up and walk away and
dust yourself off and be glad you're
only scratched up and you're thinking no
god damn it I want to kill this cougar
because this cougar keeps keeps coming
around and he's done this to me before
and I'm not willing to put up with it
anymore
so you want to be done you want to
eviscerate the chance that this thing is
going to come back at you and there's
only one way to do it and that's to
fight the way the Cougar does and if you
have better tools
like a gun or a knife then you use them
now this is metaphorically speaking I am
NOT talking about when you're dealing
with a human predator you wouldn't want
to kill the human predator but what I
mean is you have to do engage them at
their level and not be afraid to
dominate in spite of the witnesses and
their opinions because you are in a
fight for your life
how many people have ended up broken
financially psychologically physically
broken by these predators and you have
to just put the good opinions of the

fight fight for your life it's easy for
them to stand there and tell you what
they would do and the funny thing is
while you're in the midst of this
emergency acting through your instinct
the people around have the gall to be
angry at you which means they feel
entitled to their own instinctual
reactions they feel entitled to tell you
what you should do do you know how far
above you they believe they are to be
saying things like that
do you realize what level of inability
to walk a mile in someone else's shoes
those people have to have the gall to
tell you something like that standing
there in their own anger directing it at
you because of your anger which has
nothing to do with them
and they don't understand who do those
people think they are yes I'm angry
again I'm angry at this whole thing I'm
angry that there are predators around us
who keep hamstringing us
bye-bye do as I say not as I do
mindset that they have creating little

here one is acting in attack mode and

the intention is completely different
